titleStmt.title: SARS-CoV-2 virus plaque assays [Biosafety Level 3] tenOever Lab Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai Works for me dx

analytic.title: SARS-CoV-2 virus plaque assays [Biosafety Level 3] tenOever Lab Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai Works for me dx

biblStruct.note: ABSTRACT EXTERNAL LINK https://bit.ly/3d6OUny SAFETY WARNINGS

div.p: 475 ml 475 ml DMEM (w/ L-Glutamate, Sodium pyruvate) 5 ml 5 ml 100x P/S 5 ml 5 ml 100x Non-Essential Amino Acids (NEAA) Solution This is an open access protocol distributed under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution License, which permits unrestricted use, distribution, and reproduction in any medium, provided the original author and source are credited 2 Media recipe for 2XMEM: Sterile filter with 22 μm filtration unit: 100 ml 100 ml 10x MEM 10 ml 10 ml 100x P/S 10 ml 10 ml 100x L-Glutamine 6 ml 6 ml 35%BSA 340 ml 340 ml sterile ddH2O 10 ml 10 ml 1M HEPES 24 ml 24 ml 5% NaHCO3 3 Overlay Media (Ensure this is just warm to the touch when added to cells) 1 ml 1 ml PBS 31.5 ml 31.5 ml 2X MEM 17.5 ml 17.5 ml Oxoid Agar 4 Seed Vero E6 cells in 6-well plates overnight at 37 °C 37 °C (10 6 cells/well)

div.head: Dilute the SARS-CoV-2 virus logarithmically in infection media
div.p: 6 Replace media with modified DMEM and add diluted virus in each well (200 µl/well) 7 Allow virus adsorption for 01:00:00 01:00:00 , agitating the plate every 00:10:00 00:10:00 .
8 Heat the overlay media/oxoid agar mixture to ensure homogenous consistency and add it to each well (2ml/well), incubate at 37 °C 37 °C incubator for 72:00:00 72:00:00 .
